description: Glass Sitecore Mapper is an object mapping framework for mapping Sitecore items directly onto an object model allowing you to model your entire Sitecore solution as a data model. The framework handles converting data to and from fields and pulling data from related items.
releaseNotes:
(Pull 22) Support for Glass Page inheriting from System.Web.UI.Page. Supports a general page, a typed page and a dynamic page. Code contributed by Tom Dudfield
Fixes to Page Editor support for interfaces. â€“ Thanks to Howard Bayliss for finding this.
MVC GetModel processor
Made the properties Glass.Sitecore.Mapper.Configuration.SitecoreClassConfig.DataHandlers and Glass.Sitecore.Mapper.Data.AbstractSitecoreDataHandler.Property public. Requested by Nick Wesselman
Update to Castle.Core version 3.1.0
(Pull 26) Support for longs, RuleList as properties. Support for structured parameters for rendering images, general link and date fields. Thanks to Nick Wesselman
(Pull 27) Fixed problem that would cause an exception to be thrown when the system tried to make a null pointer exception. Thanks to Frantisek Dufka
(Pull 28) Fix to how how the Editable method works with inherited members. Thanks to Nick Wesselman
title: Glass.Sitecore.Mapper
